sentences.en: Carrie felt this question to be an infringement on her liberty.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉觉得这个问题是对她的自由的侵犯.

sentences.en: Discrimination against, insult of and infringement upon disabled persons shall be prohibited.
sentences.cn: 禁止歧视 、 侮辱、侵害残疾人.

sentences.en: Do you handle cases of patent and trademark infringement?
sentences.cn: 你们受理专利和商标侵权的案件 吗 ?

sentences.en: Infringement of the regulation is punishable by a fine.
It sued Centrocorp for patent infringement.
Master the method of calculating damages for losses in such infringement.
sentences.cn: 准确掌握侵权纠纷的损害赔偿计算方法.

sentences.en: Or even if it crosses over , you may be legally charged with infringement.
sentences.cn: 即使跨出国门, 很可能你被控侵权.

sentences.en: Pitt pure water infringement suit in 1996 is the typical case.
sentences.cn: 1996年的“碧纯”水侵权案就是典型的关联公司之间的诉讼.

sentences.en: Some are suspected of imitation brand - name merchandise, possible infringement.
sentences.cn: 有部分被怀疑仿名牌的商品, 可能侵权.

sentences.en: That is far from aiding and abetting copyright infringement.
sentences.cn: 这是远离协助及教唆他人侵犯版权.

sentences.en: That law is an out - and - out infringement of our civil rights.
sentences.cn: 那项法令完全侵犯了我们的公民权.

sentences.en: The classic remedy for copyright infringement is equitable relief.
sentences.cn: 传统的侵犯版权的救济是衡平法上的救济.

sentences.en: They see it as an infringement on their own freedom of action.
sentences.cn: 他们把它视为对他们行动自由的侵犯。

sentences.en: We consider the installation of cameras an infringement on people's privacy __.
sentences.cn: 我们认为摄像头的安装是对人隐私的侵犯.

phrases.tran_cn: 商标侵权；侵犯商标专用权

trans.tran_en: An infringement is an action or situation that interferes with your rights and the freedom you are entitled to
